facade

Class Facade

  • java.lang.Object
    • facade.Facade

  • public class Facade
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a facade

    It is a bridge between the UI (user interface) and the BL (business logic). All methods are static and there is one field, the current project. When the UI needs to interact with the BL, it has to use the facade.

    • Field Summary

      • addImage

        public static void addImage(java.lang.String path,
                            double height,
                            double width,
                            Folder fold)
        Add a new Image to the current folder. The image is given in parameter.
        Parameters:
        path - A String with the image path
        height - A Double equals to the height
        width - A Double equals to the width
        fold - The current folder, if the current folder is the root then fold = null
